restaurants.name: The Spice Garden
restaurants.description: Authentic Sri Lankan cuisine with a modern twist. Experience the rich flavors of traditional recipes passed down through generations.

restaurants.name: Bamboo Garden
restaurants.description: Contemporary Asian fusion restaurant offering innovative dishes that blend Eastern and Western culinary traditions.

restaurants.name: Café Francais
restaurants.description: Elegant French bistro serving classic French dishes with a contemporary presentation. Perfect for romantic dinners.

restaurants.name: Sakura Sushi Bar
restaurants.description: Fresh sushi and sashimi prepared by master chefs. Experience authentic Japanese cuisine in a modern setting.

restaurants.name: Tandoor Palace
restaurants.description: Authentic North Indian cuisine with traditional tandoor cooking. Spice up your evening with our signature curries.

restaurants.name: Mediterranean Breeze
restaurants.description: Fresh Mediterranean flavors with locally sourced ingredients. Healthy and delicious options for every palate.

restaurants.name: Burger Junction
restaurants.description: Gourmet burgers made with premium ingredients. From classic beef to innovative vegetarian options.

restaurants.name: Dolce Vita
restaurants.description: Authentic Italian trattoria serving handmade pasta and wood-fired pizzas. A taste of Italy in the heart of Sri Lanka.

restaurants.name: Golden Dragon
restaurants.description: Traditional Chinese cuisine with modern presentation. Dim sum, noodles, and authentic Chinese dishes.

restaurants.name: Seafood Paradise
restaurants.description: Fresh catch of the day prepared with local spices and traditional Sri Lankan cooking methods.

restaurants.name: The Coffee House
restaurants.description: Artisanal coffee and light meals in a cozy atmosphere. Perfect for breakfast, brunch, or afternoon coffee.

restaurants.name: Spice Route
restaurants.description: Contemporary South Asian cuisine with bold flavors and innovative presentation. A journey through the spice routes.
